entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
